Ask the patient to lean forward and push off the bed using their legs and hands while you securely hold their waist or hips. As they stand pivot them towards the wheelchair ensuring their balance is maintained throughout the transfer. Gently lower the patient into the wheelchair making sure they are comfortable and properly positioned before securing any safety belts and reattaching the footrests.
